content: this breezy openwork crochet top design is created with alternating row of single_crochet and row worked in double_crochet and chain stitches front and back panels are worked separately then seamed at the shoulders while half_double_crochet and slip stitching are used to form the set-in armbands and neckband caron simply soft makes this a soft and easy-to-wear shell that s ideal for warm weather looks sizing to fit bust measurement xs/s 28-34 71-86 5 cm m 36-38 91 5-96 5 cm l 40-42 101 5-106 5 cm xl 44-46 112-117 cm 2/3xl 48-54 122-137 cm 4/5xl 56-62 142-157 5 cm finished bust xs/s 40 101 5 cm m 43 109 cm l 46 117 cm xl 52 132 cm 2/3xl 58 147 5 cm 4/5xl 65 165 cm
